trans-unit.source: Note that we use pseq rather than seq. The two are almost equivalent, but differ in their runtime behaviour in a subtle way: seq can evaluate its arguments in either order, but pseq is required to evaluate its first argument before its second, which makes it more suitable for controlling the evaluation order in conjunction with par.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，我们使用 pseq 而不是 seq 。两者几乎相等，但是它们的运行时行为以微妙的方式有所不同： seq 可以按任意顺序评估其参数，但要求 pseq 在其第二个参数之前评估其第一个参数，这使其更适合于控制seq中的评估顺序。与 par 结合。

trans-unit.source: Note that when unboxed tuples are enabled, (# is a single lexeme, so for example when using operators like # and #- you need to write ( # ) and ( #- ) rather than (#) and (#-).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，启用未装箱的元组时， (# 是单个词素，因此例如在使用像 # 和 #- 这样的运算符时，您需要编写 ( # ) 和 ( #- ) 而不是 (#) 和 (#-) 。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that, because of platform limitations, the exit code returned by waitForProcess and getProcessExitCode cannot not be relied upon when the child uses exec, even when use_process_jobs is used. Specifically, these functions will return the exit code of the *original child* (which always exits with code 0, since it called exec), not the exit code of the process which carried on with execution after exec. This is different from the behavior prescribed by POSIX but is the best approximation that can be realised under the restrictions of the Windows process model.
trans-unit.target: 但是请注意，由于平台的限制，即使子级使用 exec ，即使使用 use_process_jobs ，也不能依赖 waitForProcess 和 getProcessExitCode 返回的退出代码。具体来说，这些函数将返回“原始子项”的退出代码（由于调用 exec ，它总是以代码0退出），而不是在 exec 之后执行的进程的退出代码。这与POSIX规定的行为不同，但是是在Windows进程模型的限制下可以实现的最佳近似。

trans-unit.source: Note: when blocking happens, an OS thread becomes tied up with the processing, so the program must have at least another OS thread if it wants to unblock itself. By corollary, a non-threaded runtime will need a process-external trigger in order to become unblocked.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the type for f allows the two parameters x and y to be assigned different types, even though it attempts to insert each of the two values, one after the other, into the same collection. If we’re trying to model collections that contain only one type of value, then this is clearly an inaccurate type. Worse still, the definition for g is accepted, without causing a type error. As a result, the error in this code will not be flagged at the point where it appears. Instead, it will show up only when we try to use g, which might even be in a different module.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， f 的类型允许为两个参数 x 和 y 分配不同的类型，即使它试图将两个值中的每个值依次插入同一个集合中。如果我们试图对仅包含一种类型的值的集合进行建模，那么这显然是不准确的类型。更糟糕的是，g的定义被接受，而不会引起类型错误。结果，该代码中的错误将不会在出现的位置进行标记。相反，它仅在我们尝试使用 g 时才会显示，g甚至可能在其他模块中。

trans-unit.source: Now find all instances, or in-scope given constraints, that unify with the target constraint, but do not match it. Such non-candidate instances might match when the target constraint is further instantiated. If all of them are incoherent top-level instances, the search succeeds, returning the prime candidate. Otherwise the search fails.
trans-unit.target: 现在，找到与目标约束统一但不匹配的所有实例或作用域内给定的约束。当进一步约束目标约束时，此类非候选实例可能会匹配。如果它们都是不连贯的顶级实例，则搜索成功，并返回主要的候选对象。否则，搜索将失败。

trans-unit.source: Now let’s have a look at the flow of control. For this we can just start our program under gdb (or an equivalent debugger) as we would any other native executable,
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们看一下控制流程。为此，我们可以像使用其他任何本机可执行文件一样，在 gdb （或等效的调试器）下启动程序，

trans-unit.source: Now run the compiler,
trans-unit.target: 现在运行编译器。

trans-unit.source: Now run the compiler:
trans-unit.target: 现在运行编译器。

trans-unit.source: Now suppose that the type inference engine needs to solve the constraint C Int [Int]. This constraint matches instances (A), (C) and (D), but the last is more specific, and hence is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 现在假设类型推断引擎需要解决约束 C Int [Int] 。此约束与实例（A），（C）和（D）匹配，但是最后一个更为具体，因此选择了该约束。

trans-unit.source: Now suppose that we receive this encoded string as 3 packets that are split up on untidy boundaries: ["hi \xe2", "\x98", "\x83"]. We cannot decode the entire Unicode string until we have received all three packets, but we would like to make progress as we receive each one.
trans-unit.target: 现在假设我们以3个数据包的形式接收此编码字符串，这些数据包在 ["hi \xe2", "\x98", "\x83"] 边界上分开：[“ hi \ xe2”，“ \ x98”，“ \ x83”]。在我们收到所有三个数据包之前，我们无法解码整个Unicode字符串，但是我们希望在收到每个数据包时取得进展。

trans-unit.source: Now suppose that, in some client module, we are searching for an instance of the target constraint(C ty1 .. tyn). The search works like this:

trans-unit.source: Now the lexp nonterminal is redundant and can be dropped from the grammar.

trans-unit.source: Now the file Adder.dll can be used from other programming languages. Before calling any functions in Adder it is necessary to call HsStart, and at the very end call HsEnd.

trans-unit.source: Now the inlining of op is delayed until the rule has a chance to fire. The down-side is that instance declarations must define op_c, but all other uses should go via op.
trans-unit.target: 现在， op 的内联会延迟到规则有机会触发之前。 op_c 的一面是实例声明必须定义op_c，但所有其他用途都应通过 op 进行。

trans-unit.source: Now we can define counters with different underlying implementations:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以定义不同底层实现的计数器。

trans-unit.source: Now we must infer a type for z. To do so without generalising over kind variables, we must default the kind variables of 'MkCompose. We can easily default a and b to Type, but f and g would be ill-kinded if defaulted. The definition for z is thus an error.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们必须推断 z 的类型。要做到这一点而不泛化种类变量，我们必须默认 'MkCompose 的种类变量。我们可以轻松地将 a 和 b 默认设置为 Type ，但是如果默认将 f 和 g 设置为不正确。因此， z 的定义是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Now we would like to be able to use the operations associated with each of those monad transformers on InterpM actions. Since the uppermost monad transformer of InterpM is StateT, it already has the state operations get and set.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们希望能够对 InterpM 动作使用与每个monad转换器相关的操作。由于 InterpM 的最高Monad转换器是 StateT ，因此它已经具有状态操作 get 和 set 。

trans-unit.source: Now we’re stuck, since we have no way to refer to a on the right-hand side of the B family instance, so this instance doesn’t really make sense in a GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving setting.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们被困住了，因为我们无法在 B 系列实例的右侧引用 a ，因此在 GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving 设置中，该实例实际上没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: Now you are thinking: 'Wow, what a great monad! I wish I could use Reader functionality in MyFavoriteComplexMonad!'. Don't worry. This can be easily done with the ReaderT monad transformer. This example shows how to combine ReaderT with the IO monad.
trans-unit.target: 现在您在想：'哇，多么伟大的单子！我希望我可以在MyFavoriteComplexMonad中使用阅读器功能！不用担心 使用 ReaderT monad转换器可以轻松完成此操作。本示例说明如何将 ReaderT 与IO monad 结合使用。

trans-unit.source: Now, before you start compiling, and any time you change the imports in your program, do make depend before you do make cool_pgm. The command ghc -M will append the needed dependencies to your Makefile.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在开始编译之前，以及任何时候在程序中更改 imports 在 make cool_pgm 之前都要先 make depend 。 ghc -M 命令将所需的依赖项附加到 Makefile 中。

trans-unit.source: Now, for each remaining group G, try each type ty from the default-type list in turn; if setting a = ty would allow the constraints in G to be completely solved. If so, default a to ty.
trans-unit.target: 现在，对于剩余的每个组G，依次尝试使用默认类型列表中的每个类型 ty ；如果设置 a = ty 将完全解决G中的约束。如果是这样， ty a 缺省设置为ty。

trans-unit.target: 现在,我们来看看这种格式的解码器。

trans-unit.target: 现在，由于 :force 检查了 left 的运行时值，因此它重构了其类型。我们可以看到这种类型重构的结果：

trans-unit.target: 现在，对类型 f 的定义进行类型检查，在类型环境中类型为 g 。

trans-unit.target: 现在,我们运行这个程序。

trans-unit.source: O(1) Unlike cons, cons' is strict in the ByteString that we are consing onto. More precisely, it forces the head and the first chunk. It does this because, for space efficiency, it may coalesce the new byte onto the first 'chunk' rather than starting a new 'chunk'.
trans-unit.target: O（1）与 cons 不同， cons' 在我们要使用的ByteString中严格。更确切地说，它迫使头部和第一个块。这样做是因为，为了提高空间效率，它可以将新字节合并到第一个“块”上，而不是开始一个新的“块”。

trans-unit.source: O(1). A Builder taking a single native machine word. The word is written in host order, host endian form, for the machine you're on. On a 64 bit machine the Int is an 8 byte value, on a 32 bit machine, 4 bytes. Values written this way are not portable to different endian or word sized machines, without conversion.
trans-unit.target: O(1).一个生成器取一个单一的本机字。这个字是按照你所在的机器的主机顺序写的,主机endian形式。在64位机器上,Int是一个8字节的值,在32位机器上,是4个字节。这样写的值在没有转换的情况下,不能移植到不同恩迪安或字大小的机器上。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Adjust a value at a specific key. When the key is not a member of the map, the original map is returned.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。在特定的键处调整一个值。当该键不是地图的成员时,将返回原地图。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Combines insert operation with old value retrieval. The expression (insertLookupWithKey f k x map) is a pair where the first element is equal to (lookup k map) and the second element equal to (insertWithKey f k x map).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。将插入操作与旧值检索结合在一起。表达式（ insertLookupWithKey f k x map ）是一对，其中第一个元素等于（ lookup k map ），第二个元素等于（ insertWithKey f k x map ）。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete a key and its value from the map. When the key is not a member of the map, the original map is returned.

trans-unit.target: O(log n)。删除并找到最小元素。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete the element at index, i.e. by its zero-based index in the sequence sorted by keys. If the index is out of range (less than zero, greater or equal to size of the map), error is called.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。删除index处的元素，即按键排序序列中的从零开始的索引。如果索引超出范围（小于零，大于或等于地图的 size ），则会调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete the element at index, i.e. by its zero-based index in the sorted sequence of elements. If the index is out of range (less than zero, greater or equal to size of the set), error is called.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。删除index处的元素，即按排序后的元素序列中从零开始的索引。如果索引超出范围（小于零，大于或等于集合的 size ），则会调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete the maximal element. Returns an empty set if the set is empty.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。删除最大元素。如果集合为空,则返回一个空集合。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete the maximal key. Returns an empty map if the map is empty.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。删除最大的键。如果地图为空,返回一个空地图。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete the minimal element. Returns an empty set if the set is empty.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。删除最小元素。如果集合为空,则返回一个空集合。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Delete the minimal key. Returns an empty map if the map is empty.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。删除最小键。如果地图为空,返回一个空地图。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Divide a map at the point where a predicate on the keys stops holding. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all keys j and k in the map, j < k ==> p j >= p k.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上的谓词停止保持的位置划分地图。用户负责确保映射中的所有键 j 和 k j < k ==> p j >= p k 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Divide a set at the point where a predicate on the elements stops holding. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all elements j and k in the set, j < k ==> p j >= p k.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在元素的谓词停止保持的点上划分集合。用户是负责确保所有元素 j 和 k 在该组， j < k ==> p j >= p k 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Drop while a predicate on the elements holds. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all elements j and k in the set, j < k ==> p j >= p k. See note at spanAntitone.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在元素的谓词成立时放下。用户是负责确保所有元素 j 和 k 在该组， j < k ==> p j >= p k 。请参阅 spanAntitone 中的注释。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Drop while a predicate on the keys holds. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all keys j and k in the map, j < k ==> p j >= p k. See note at spanAntitone.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。按住键上的谓词时放下。用户负责确保映射中的所有键 j 和 k j < k ==> p j >= p k 。请参阅 spanAntitone 中的注释。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Drop while a predicate on the keys holds. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all keys j and k in the map, j < k ==> p j >= p k. See note at spanAntitone.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。按住键上的谓词时放下。用户负责确保映射中的所有键 j 和 k j < k ==> p j >= p k 。请参阅 spanAntitone 中的注释。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find largest element smaller or equal to the given one.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。找出小于或等于给定元素的最大元素。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find largest element smaller than the given one.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。找出比给定元素小的最大元素。

trans-unit.target: O(log n)。找出大于或等于给定的最小键,并返回相应的(键,值)对。

trans-unit.target: O(log n)。找出比给定键大的最小键,并返回相应的(键,值)对。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find the value at a key. Calls error when the element can not be found.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上找到值。当找不到元素时调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find the value at a key. Calls error when the element can not be found.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上找到值。当找不到元素时调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find the value at a key. Calls error when the element can not be found.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上找到值。当找不到元素时调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find the value at a key. Returns Nothing when the element can not be found.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上找到值。当找不到元素时，返回 Nothing 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Find the value at a key. Returns Nothing when the element can not be found.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上找到值。当找不到元素时，返回 Nothing 。

trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在键上找到值。当找不到元素时，返回 Nothing 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert a new key and value in the map. If the key is already present in the map, the associated value is replaced with the supplied value. insert is equivalent to insertWith const.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。在地图中插入新的键和值。如果键已存在于映射中，则将关联的值替换为提供的值。 insert 等效于 insertWith const 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert a new key and value in the map. If the key is already present in the map, the associated value is replaced with the supplied value. insert is equivalent to insertWith const.

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert a new key and value in the map. If the key is already present in the map, the associated value is replaced with the supplied value. insert is equivalent to insertWith const.

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert an element in a set. If the set already contains an element equal to the given value, it is replaced with the new value.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。在一个集合中插入一个元素。如果集合中已经包含一个等于给定值的元素,则用新的值替换。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert with a function, combining key, new value and old value. insertWithKey f key value mp will insert the pair (key, value) into mp if key does not exist in the map. If the key does exist, the function will insert the pair (key,f key new_value old_value). Note that the key passed to f is the same key passed to insertWithKey.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。插入功能，结合键，新值和旧值。如果映射中不存在key，则 insertWithKey f key value mp 会将对（键，值）插入 mp 中。如果键确实存在，该函数将插入对 (key,f key new_value old_value) 。请注意，传递给f的键与传递给 insertWithKey 的键相同。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert with a function, combining key, new value and old value. insertWithKey f key value mp will insert the pair (key, value) into mp if key does not exist in the map. If the key does exist, the function will insert the pair (key,f key new_value old_value). Note that the key passed to f is the same key passed to insertWithKey.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。插入功能，结合键，新值和旧值。如果映射中不存在key，则 insertWithKey f key value mp 会将对（键，值）插入 mp 中。如果键确实存在，该函数将插入对 (key,f key new_value old_value) 。请注意，传递给f的键与传递给 insertWithKey 的键相同。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert with a function, combining new value and old value. insertWith f key value mp will insert the pair (key, value) into mp if key does not exist in the map. If the key does exist, the function will insert the pair (key, f new_value old_value).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。插入一个函数，将新值和旧值组合在一起。 insertWith f key value mp mp 如果映射中不存在key，则将对（键，值）插入mp。如果键确实存在，则该函数将插入对 (key, f new_value old_value) 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Insert with a function, combining new value and old value. insertWith f key value mp will insert the pair (key, value) into mp if key does not exist in the map. If the key does exist, the function will insert the pair (key, f new_value old_value).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。插入一个函数，将新值和旧值组合在一起。 insertWith f key value mp mp 如果映射中不存在key，则将对（键，值）插入mp。如果键确实存在，则该函数将插入对 (key, f new_value old_value) 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Is the key a member of the map? See also notMember.

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Lookup and update. See also updateWithKey. The function returns changed value, if it is updated. Returns the original key value if the map entry is deleted.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。查找和更新。另请参见 updateWithKey 。如果更新，该函数将返回更改后的值。如果删除了地图项，则返回原始键值。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Lookup the index of a key, which is its zero-based index in the sequence sorted by keys. The index is a number from 0 up to, but not including, the size of the map.

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Retrieve an element by its index, i.e. by its zero-based index in the sequence sorted by keys. If the index is out of range (less than zero, greater or equal to size of the map), error is called.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。通过其索引（即，按键排序的序列中从零开始的索引）检索元素。如果索引超出范围（小于零，大于或等于地图的 size ），则会调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Retrieve an element by its index, i.e. by its zero-based index in the sequence sorted by keys. If the index is out of range (less than zero, greater or equal to size of the map), error is called.

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Retrieve an element by its index, i.e. by its zero-based index in the sequence sorted by keys. If the index is out of range (less than zero, greater or equal to size of the map), error is called.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。通过其索引（即，按键排序的序列中从零开始的索引）检索元素。如果索引超出范围（小于零，大于或等于地图的 size ），则会调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Retrieves the maximal (key,value) pair of the map, and the map stripped of that element, or Nothing if passed an empty map.

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Return the index of a key, which is its zero-based index in the sequence sorted by keys. The index is a number from 0 up to, but not including, the size of the map. Calls error when the key is not a member of the map.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。返回键的索引，它是按键排序的序列中从零开始的索引。索引是从0到但不包括地图 size 的数字。当键不是地图的 member 时，调用 error 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Split a map at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。在某一特定索引处拆分一个地图。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Split a set at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: O(log n)。在某一特定索引处拆分一个集合。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Take while a predicate on the elements holds. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all elements j and k in the set, j < k ==> p j >= p k. See note at spanAntitone.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。假设元素上的谓词成立。用户是负责确保所有元素 j 和 k 在该组， j < k ==> p j >= p k 。请参阅 spanAntitone 中的注释。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Take while a predicate on the keys holds. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all keys j and k in the map, j < k ==> p j >= p k. See note at spanAntitone.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。按住键上的谓词。用户负责确保映射中的所有键 j 和 k j < k ==> p j >= p k 。请参阅 spanAntitone 中的注释。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). Take while a predicate on the keys holds. The user is responsible for ensuring that for all keys j and k in the map, j < k ==> p j >= p k. See note at spanAntitone.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。按住键上的谓词。用户负责确保映射中的所有键 j 和 k j < k ==> p j >= p k 。请参阅 spanAntitone 中的注释。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (alterF f k map) alters the value x at k, or absence thereof. alterF can be used to inspect, insert, delete, or update a value in an IntMap. In short : lookup k $ alterF f k m = f (lookup k m).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ alterF f k map ）改变值 x 在 k ，或不存在它们。 alterF 可用于检查，插入，删除或更新 IntMap 中的值。简而言之： lookup k $ alterF f k m = f (lookup k m) 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (alterF f k map) alters the value x at k, or absence thereof. alterF can be used to inspect, insert, delete, or update a value in an IntMap. In short : lookup k $ alterF f k m = f (lookup k m).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ alterF f k map ）改变值 x 在 k ，或不存在它们。 alterF 可用于检查，插入，删除或更新 IntMap 中的值。简而言之： lookup k $ alterF f k m = f (lookup k m) 。

trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ alterF f k map ）改变值 x 在 k ，或不存在它们。 alterF 可用于检查，插入，删除或更新 IntMap 中的值。简而言之： lookup k $ alterF f k m = f (lookup k m) 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (alter f k map) alters the value x at k, or absence thereof. alter can be used to insert, delete, or update a value in a Map. In short : lookup k (alter f k m) = f (lookup k m).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ alter f k map ）改变值 x 在 k ，或不存在它们。 alter 可用于插入，删除或更新 Map 中的值。简而言之： lookup k (alter f k m) = f (lookup k m) 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (alterF f k map) alters the value x at k, or absence thereof. alterF can be used to inspect, insert, delete, or update a value in a Map. In short: lookup k <$> alterF f k m = f (lookup k m).
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ alterF f k map ）改变值 x 在 k ，或不存在它们。 alterF 可用于检查，插入，删除或更新 Map 中的值。简而言之： lookup k <$> alterF f k m = f (lookup k m) 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (split k map) is a pair (map1,map2) where the keys in map1 are smaller than k and the keys in map2 larger than k. Any key equal to k is found in neither map1 nor map2.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ split k map ）是一对 (map1,map2) ，其中 map1 中的键小于 k ，而 map2 中的键大于 k 。在 map1 和 map2 中都找不到等于 k 的任何键。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (splitLookup k map) splits a map just like split but also returns lookup k map.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ splitLookup k map ）像 split 一样拆分地图，而且还返回 lookup k map 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (update f k map) updates the value x at k (if it is in the map). If (f x) is Nothing, the element is deleted. If it is (Just y), the key k is bound to the new value y.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ update f k map ）更新该值 x 在 k （如果它是在地图）。如果（ f x ）为 Nothing ，则删除该元素。如果它是（ Just y ），则密钥 k 绑定到新值 y 。

trans-unit.source: O(log n). The expression (update f k map) updates the value x at k (if it is in the map). If (f x) is Nothing, the element is deleted. If it is (Just y), the key k is bound to the new value y.
trans-unit.target: O（log n）。表达式（ update f k map ）更新 k 处的值 x （如果它在映射中）。如果（ f x ）为 Nothing ，则删除该元素。如果它是（ Just y y），则密钥 k 绑定到新值 y 。

trans-unit.source: O(min(n,W)). Insert with a combining function. insertWith f key value mp will insert the pair (key, value) into mp if key does not exist in the map. If the key does exist, the function will insert f new_value old_value.

trans-unit.source: O(min(n,W)). The expression (alter f k map) alters the value x at k, or absence thereof. alter can be used to insert, delete, or update a value in an IntMap. In short : lookup k (alter f k m) = f (lookup k m).
trans-unit.target: O（最小（n，W））。表达式（ alter f k map ）改变值 x 在 k ，或不存在它们。 alter 可用于在 IntMap 中插入，删除或更新值。简而言之： lookup k (alter f k m) = f (lookup k m) 。

trans-unit.source: O(min(n,W)). The expression (insertLookupWithKey f k x map) is a pair where the first element is equal to (lookup k map) and the second element equal to (insertWithKey f k x map).
trans-unit.target: O（最小（n，W））。表达式（ insertLookupWithKey f k x map ）是一对，其中第一个元素等于（ lookup k map ），第二个元素等于（ insertWithKey f k x map ）。

trans-unit.source: O(min(n,W)). The expression (split k map) is a pair (map1,map2) where all keys in map1 are lower than k and all keys in map2 larger than k. Any key equal to k is found in neither map1 nor map2.
trans-unit.target: O（最小（n，W））。表达式（ split k map ）是一对 (map1,map2) 其中所有的键 map1 是低于 k 和在所有的键 map2 大于 k 。在 map1 和 map2 中都找不到等于 k 的任何键。

trans-unit.source: O(min(n,W)). The expression (update f k map) updates the value x at k (if it is in the map). If (f k x) is Nothing, the element is deleted. If it is (Just y), the key k is bound to the new value y.
trans-unit.target: O（最小（n，W））。表达式（ update f k map ）更新该值 x 在 k （如果它是在地图）。如果（ f k x ）为 Nothing ，则删除该元素。如果它是（ Just y ），则密钥 k 绑定到新值 y 。

trans-unit.source: O(min(n,W)). The expression (update f k map) updates the value x at k (if it is in the map). If (f k x) is Nothing, the element is deleted. If it is (Just y), the key k is bound to the new value y.

trans-unit.source: O(n) Convert a string to lower case, using simple case conversion. The result string may be longer than the input string. For instance, the Latin capital letter I with dot above (U+0130) maps to the sequence Latin small letter i (U+0069) followed by combining dot above (U+0307).
trans-unit.target: O(n)使用简单的大小写转换,将一个字符串转换为小写。结果字符串可能比输入字符串长。例如,拉丁文大写字母I与上面的点(U+0130)映射到序列拉丁文小写字母i(U+0069),然后再加上上面的组合点(U+0307)。

trans-unit.source: O(n) Convert a string to upper case, using simple case conversion. The result string may be longer than the input string. For instance, the German eszett (U+00DF) maps to the two-letter sequence SS.
trans-unit.target: O(n)使用简单的大小写转换,将一个字符串转换为大写。结果字符串可能比输入的字符串长。例如,德语eszett (U+00DF)映射到两个字母序列SS。

trans-unit.source: O(n) Like unfoldr, unfoldrN builds a Text from a seed value. However, the length of the result should be limited by the first argument to unfoldrN. This function is more efficient than unfoldr when the maximum length of the result is known and correct, otherwise its performance is similar to unfoldr. Subject to fusion. Performs replacement on invalid scalar values.
trans-unit.target: O（n）像 unfoldr 一样， unfoldrN 从种子值构建 Text 。但是，结果的长度应受 unfoldrN 的第一个参数限制。当结果的最大长度已知且正确时，此功能比 unfoldr 器更有效，否则其性能类似于展开 unfoldr 。受到融合。对无效的标量值执行替换。

trans-unit.source: O(n) Make a copy of the ByteString with its own storage. This is mainly useful to allow the rest of the data pointed to by the ByteString to be garbage collected, for example if a large string has been read in, and only a small part of it is needed in the rest of the program.

trans-unit.source: O(n) Pack a null-terminated sequence of bytes, pointed to by an Addr# (an arbitrary machine address assumed to point outside the garbage-collected heap) into a ByteString. A much faster way to create an Addr# is with an unboxed string literal, than to pack a boxed string. A unboxed string literal is compiled to a static char [] by GHC. Establishing the length of the string requires a call to strlen(3), so the Addr# must point to a null-terminated buffer (as is the case with "string"# literals in GHC). Use unsafePackAddressLen if you know the length of the string statically.
trans-unit.target: O（n）将以Addr＃（假定为指向垃圾收集堆之外的任意计算机地址）指向的空终止字节序列包装到 ByteString 中。创建 Addr# 的更快方法是使用未装箱的字符串文字，而不是打包装箱的字符串。GHC 将未装箱的字符串文字编译为静态 char [] 。确定字符串的长度需要调用 strlen(3) ，因此 Addr# 必须指向以空值结尾的缓冲区（GHC中 "string"# 文字就是这种情况）。如果您静态知道字符串的长度，请使用 unsafePackAddressLen 。
